state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First, it would be fantastic if you could attempt to take a trip west. And then, venture north. Once you do that, move east. Then, head south. And then, attempt to go west. And then, attempt to move north. Then, travel north. Okay, and then, attempt to go to the east. That done, try to take a trip north. Next, go west. If you can succeed at that, make an attempt to travel west. With that over with, move west. And then, move west. After that, travel west. That done, retrieve the coin from the floor of the dish-pit. Alright, thanks! -= Cookhouse =- You've entered a cookhouse. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Cookhouse =-0/1
next_state: -= Pantry =- Well, here we are in the pantry. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Pantry =-0/2
